examples.example: 我的努力工作换来了不错的收入，这让我感到很有成就感。

translate.english: My hard work has brought in a good income, which makes me feel a great sense of accomplishment.

examples.example: 随着工作经验的增加，我的收入也在稳步提升。

translate.english: As the work experience increases, my income is also steadily improving.

examples.example: 通过不断提升自己的能力，我的收入有了显著的提高，生活也更加美好了。

translate.english: By continuously improving my own abilities, my income has been significantly improved, and life has become even more beautiful.
